definition.name: Deploy to Azure Container Instances
definition.description: Deploy to Containers to Azure Container Instances. github.com/Azure/Actions
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: resource-group
inputs.description: Name of the Resource Group in which the Container Instance will be created

inputs.name: azure-file-volume-account-key
inputs.description: The storage account access key used to access the Azure File Share

inputs.name: azure-file-volume-account-name
inputs.description: The name of the storage account that contains the Azure File Share

inputs.name: azure-file-volume-mount-path
inputs.description: The path within the container where the Azure File Volume should be mounted. Must not contain ":"

inputs.name: azure-file-volume-share-name
inputs.description: The name of the Azure File Share to be mounted as a volume

inputs.name: azure-file-volume-read-only
inputs.description: Should the Azure File Share be Mounted as Read Only. Accepted { true, false }

inputs.name: command-line
inputs.description: The command line to run when the container is started, e.g. "/bin/bash -c myscript.sh"

inputs.name: cpu
inputs.description: Number of CPU Cores Required

inputs.name: dns-name-label
inputs.description: The DNS Name Label for Container with Public IP

inputs.name: environment-variables
inputs.description: List of environment variables for the container. Space-seperated in "key=value" format

inputs.name: gitrepo-dir
inputs.description: The target directory path in the git repository. Must not contain ".."

inputs.name: gitrepo-mount-path
inputs.description: The path within the container where the git repo volume should be mounted. Must not contain ":"

inputs.name: gitrepo-revision
inputs.description: The commit hash for the specified revision

inputs.name: gitrepo-url
inputs.description: The URL of a git repository to be mounted as a volume

inputs.name: gpu-count
inputs.description: The Number of GPU Resources needed in the Container

inputs.name: gpu-sku
inputs.description: The SKU for the GPUs specified. Accepted Values are { K80, P100, V100 }

inputs.name: image
inputs.description: Specify the fully qualified container image name. For example, "myregistry.azurecr.io/nginx:latest" or "python:3.7.2-alpine/"

inputs.name: ip-address
inputs.description: IP Address type of the Container Group. Accepted Values are { Private, Public }.Currently it only supports { Public }

inputs.name: location
inputs.description: Location where the Container will be deployed

inputs.name: log-analytics-workspace
inputs.description: The Log Analytics Workspace Name or Id

inputs.name: log-analytics-workspace-key
inputs.description: The Log Analytics Workspace Key

inputs.name: log-type
inputs.description: The Log type to be used. Accepted Values are { ContainerInsights, ContainerInstanceLogs }

inputs.name: memory
inputs.description: Required Memory of the Containers in GB, accurate to one decimal place

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the Container Group Instance

inputs.name: os-type
inputs.description: The OS type of the Containers. Accepted Values are  { Linux, Windows }

inputs.name: ports
inputs.description: The Ports to Open on the Container. Space seperate the ports for multiple values

inputs.name: protocol
inputs.description: The Network protocol to use. Accepted Values are { TCP, UDP }

inputs.name: registry-login-server
inputs.description: The container image registry login server

inputs.name: registry-username
inputs.description: Username to log in Container Image Registry Server

inputs.name: registry-password
inputs.description: Password to log in Container Image Registry Server

inputs.name: restart-policy
inputs.description: Restart Policy for the container(s). Accepted Values are { Always, OnFailure, Never }

inputs.name: secure-environment-variables
inputs.description: List of secure environment variables for the container. Space seperated values in "key=value" format
